articles.description: The world's biggest technology trade show is underway, and we're tracking the best announcements from top brands all week long.
articles.content:
Maria Diaz/ZDNET
Follow ZDNET: Add us as a preferred source on Google.
We're officially counting down the hours until the Consumer Electronics Show, CES 2026, begins, and a quick glance at the news… [+1426 chars]

articles.title: Intel launches Core Ultra Series 3 CPUs, made using its long-awaited 18A process - Ars Technica
articles.description: New chips launch "this month," targeting high-end ultraportable PCs.

articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.title: AMD unveils new AI PC processors for general use and gaming at CES - TechCrunch
articles.description: AMD announced the latest version of its AI-powered PC chips designed for a variety of tasks from gaming to content creation and multitasking.
articles.content:
AMD Chair and CEO Lisa Su kicked off her keynote at CES 2026 with a message about what compute could deliver: AI for everyone. 
As part of that promise, AMD announced a new line of AI processors as … [+2035 chars]
